hero.title: Pavel Pulin
hero.subtitle: Tech Lead & Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: 18+ years of development experience. From HTML coder to Tech Lead

about.title: About Me
about.bio: With over 18 years of experience in software development, I have progressed from an HTML coder to a versatile full-stack developer, technical leader, and infrastructure specialist. My career spans diverse roles and responsibilities, including frontend and backend development, designing REST APIs and GraphQL services, integrating third-party services, and setting up developer infrastructure.
about.quote: Evolution from HTML coder to Tech Lead over 18+ years demonstrates my ability to adapt to new technologies and take on increasingly complex roles in development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.projectDescription: Each project demonstrates different aspects of development: from technical leadership to AI/ML integration
projects.agriculturalPlatform: Technical leadership in developing a platform for US agricultural farms. Backend architecture and cloud infrastructure, ensuring system scalability and reliability.
projects.aiSearchSystem: Semantic search system using OpenAI API and Qdrant vector database. Integration with multiple websites and workflow automation.
projects.paymentIntegration: Integration of Stripe and Paddle payment systems for subscription and one-time payment processing. Setting up authentication through Auth0.
projects.graphqlPlatform: Development of GraphQL platform with Apollo Federation. Creation and implementation of subgraph services for distributed system.
projects.parsingBotSystem: Website parsing system using Selenium and Docker. Creating hundreds of bot instances to process thousands of sites.
projects.bankingApplications: Frontend development for mobile application and bank web interface. Creating interfaces for internal services.
projects.legacyRefactoring: Refactoring legacy libraries and migration to microservice architecture. Implementation of NestJS and CI/CD process setup.
projects.translationSystem: Integration of Smartcat translation system with automation of repository parsing and phrase loading.
